author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed dodgy line endings so that they now all use the regular LF. I think these were incorrectly caused by me by using a combination of cygwin on NT and Forte to write the code in the first place.

msg: Applied John  Keyes' patches to optional Options and multiple value support

msg: Applied patches kindly submitted by John Keyes to support mandatory options and option groups along with new test cases
